main event: On May 7, 1952, a Pan American flight crew observed three unidentified flying objects off the east coast of the United States.
interesting points: The objects were described as white with orange-blue tails,Two of them were spheres with one tail,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds,The crew reported the objects glowing in bursts of light,Radar confirmed the objects were at the same altitude as the aircraft.
sighted object: three circular objects with amber trailing lights
location: Atlantic Ocean, Offshore East Coast, USA
witness description: crew members of a Pan American flight
